What we do in our gatherings:

In these gatherings we use a practical approach that puts the metaphysical theory of non duality and A Course in Miracles into practice, bringing us closer to the Truth of What we really are. We call this approach PsychoSpirituality, as it removes the ego/psychological blocks to the awareness of our spiritual Truth, constantly bringing us back to The One Question: do I choose to join with the Higher Self or with the ego?

Our mental understanding of the metaphysical truth often doesn’t turn into an authentic experience because of the presence of deep unconscious beliefs. Uncovering and healing these beliefs is one of the aim of these gatherings, along with the teachings received from the Voice of the Higher Self throughout the session. The participants are given the opportunity to work on their personal issues, or to witness others going through the process. As the core unconscious beliefs are shared by the one ego, the healing that comes from the Higher Self happens for all of us – we are never healed alone.

Intensive gatherings with deep teachings and personal healing:

Starting with real life situations brought by the participants, related teachings are received through the Voice of the Higher Self, allowing us to recognize what is really going on in the mind beyond the veil of the ego layers. We then apply a healing method to release what was identified as illusions and blocks to the truth.Witnessing the process during the gatherings allows the participants to utilize this practical healing method in their everyday life.

What is PsychoSpirituality?

" The whole idea of PsychoSpirituality as we see it, is to transcend what is done in a psychological approach, to transcend what seems to be psychological. The psychological aspect of it is just something to deal with clearing away the clutter to get to the point where we can reach the spiritual truth, and realize that it has already happened, it’s already there. It seems that we think about what appears to be a psychological issue, it seems that we do techniques that revolve around it, but really, it’s about connecting first at a deeper level, keeping that in mind while we are going through the other aspects of it. That’s the spiritual aspect that permeates the whole process. No matter what it looks like that we are doing in form, we are still always coming back to the joining with the Spirit, the True Self, joining with the truth of What we are.  

Whereas psychology deals with duality and helps make duality better and more tolerable, with PsychoSpirituality we focus of the pure truth of Oneness after we are dealing with the idea of the illusion of separateness. At the Spirit level, the True Self level, there is nothing to do but to accept Oneness. But in form, we apply these psychospiritual techniques to facilitate the furtherance of the acceptance of the spiritual aspect. Acceptance is easier when we dig through the debris of the mind that obscures the validity of the essence of our being. Just merely stating the truth does help the people at times, but sometimes, taking an active stance and effort towards digging through the lies of the illusion can help facilitate the acceptance of Oneness.

The focus of this approach is really Oneness, but the psychological aspect is put in service of realizing the oneness of What we are. And because it’s put in service of it with the energy the force and the will of Oneness behind it, it’s not like regular psychology, it’s not even close. We’re working from the other side of it, we are not standing on the side of duality, working back and hoping to get to Oneness. We stand on the side of Oneness, undoing the idea and the effects of duality, approaching it from the opposite side, because of the very nature of how we are doing it.

Psychology attempts to do something ; what we are doing is no attempt, it’s coming from a place of truth that is not speculative. There’s no argument : Oneness is Oneness. That is where we are coming from, and we are helping the mind, the aspects of our mind that appear like other people, to realize that there are no other people, to work through the imaginary problems. Instead of being totally fixated inside of the problem, we are doing what Einstein talked about, we are going to a different level to solve the imaginary problem. It’s beautiful and elegant in its idea and its approach, and it doesn’t requires anybody to believe in the methodology of it, it just works because it cannot not work, because it is what it is. Eventually, the mind is pulled out of the illusion, and we proceed from there." Ken Kelly 

Who should join?

This is a practical group combining teachings and personal healing. We invite you to bring the difficulties you are facing in your life when you are stuck in the ego perspective, or your blocks to be the Love you really are. All is needed from you is the desire to join with the truth instead of the ego. We then let the Higher Self guide us to identify the root of these difficulties and showing us the truth beyond these illusions, before releasing them. 

Because we constantly refer to the truth of What we really are, it’s useful to have at least a basic knowledge of non dual spiritual approaches (A Course in Miracles, advaïta, Zen, Buddhism, etc.)

Advanced students of A Course in Miracles or other non dual spiritual paths will find here the opportunity to remove the ego beliefs that prevent them from experiencing what they know to be the truth.

About Ken and Brigitte

Ken became aware of his True Nature and experienced Oneness at an early age. Raised in a Christian culture, he had been practicing Buddhism for over ten years, which then lead to non-duality. He has been teaching the principles of A Course in Miracles for 16 years. These various spiritual practices are for him but pointers to the Truth, which always lies beyond any conceptualization. During a period of intensive spiritual practice in 1998, he received an inner teaching - The One Question - which facilitates the teachings in the spiritual gatherings.

Putting his personality (ego) aside, Ken became more and more receptive to hear the 'still small voice' of what can be called the Universal Self, the Higher Self, or Spirit. During gatherings, Ken shares the teachings he recieves in this way. As Ken sings in one of His songs: 'I hear the Voice for God in everything I do, and if you still your mind, you will hear it too'.

Along with being a spiritual teacher, Ken has had a career as a musician, songwriter and music producer. His songs are as inspired as his teachings, and the moment he grabs his guitar is always anticipated in meetings and seminars!

Brigitte felt the call of Truth at an early age. In search of answers, she turned first to science and quantum physics and became a physicist engineer. She then became a psychologist and a psychotherapist, and had a career as a trainer in Therapeutia, the Training Institute of Psychotherapy she founded. Her spiritual journey is marked by her encounter with A Course in Miracles and Advaita. In 2004, she experienced a spiritual connection that called her to devote her life to Self-realization. When she meets Ken and his teachings of The One Question, her practice of many therapeutic methods lead to the alchemy of this PsychoSpirituality approach.

Visit www.PsychoSpirituality.com for resources and more information.
name: PsychoSpirituality.com

description:
English version below

Nous sommes un collectif rassemblant des entreprises, réseaux, et individus passionés par l'entrepreunariat durable sous toutes ses formes. Notre but est de créer une dynamique positive favorisant l'emergence de projets entrepreneuriaux qui aient du sens. Bruxelles regorge d’initiatives et de personnes qui ont envie de s’investir. PIE (Positive Impact Entrepreneurs) c’est l’envie de partager nos recettes, y ajouter de nouveaux ingrédients et pouvoir inviter chacun(e) à goûter et prendre part au gâteau librement.

Positive Impact? De quoi s’agit-il ?
Il s’agit d’idées, de projets, de businesses qui combinent les aspects suivants :

Ces idées, projets, businesses se distinguent par une ou plusieurs des caractéristiques décrites dans le document "Vous avez dit impact positif ?"

Qu'est ce que cela va m'apporter?

Vous êtes porteur de projet:

• Lors du PIE event, vous présentez votre idée / projet / business et les défis brûlants

• Les participants vous posent des questions, vous conseillent, vous challengent en toute bienveillance pour vous faire avancer

• Vous avez l’opportunité de vous connecter avec d’autres porteurs d’idées / de projets pour former un écosystème local d’initiatives entrepreunariales à impact positif

• Vous avez un projet à présenter? Merci d'utiliser ce formulaire pour présenter votre idée, nous prendrons contact avec vous pour que vous puissiez le présenter au prochain PIE Time ! 

Vous êtes participant/contributeur:

• Vous découvrez des idées, des projets, des businesses à impact positif qui vous sont présentés par leurs initiateurs (vous serez informés à l’avance du menu)

• Vous contribuez à faire avancer ces idées, projets, businesses en posant des questions, en partageant vos expériences et vos connaissances

• Vous identifiez les opportunités et les contraintes des modèles d’affaires à impact positif en cours d’émergence

• Vous participez à des ateliers d’intelligence collective visant à traduire ces modèles en idées / projets / businesses

• Vous enrichissez vos propres idées / projets / businesses, et - pourquoi pas ? - à une prochaine édition, vous serez peut être à la place du porteur d’idée présentant son projet.

ENGLISH version

We are a group of enterprises, networks and individuals passionated by sustainable entrepreneurship in all its forms. Our goal is to create a positive dynamic favouring the emergence of meaningful entrepreneurial projects  Brussels is full of initiatives and people who want to  get involved. PIE (Positive Impact Entrepreneurs) is about the desire to share our recipes, to bring new ingredients and to invite everyone to taste the PIE and take its share of it.

Positive Impact ? What does that mean ?
Positive Impact ideas, projects and businesses combine entrepreneurial spirit, economical viability, care for environment & low carbon footprint, local focus and territorial integration, social inclusiveness . They share some of the features described in the document named "Did You Say Positive Impact ?"

What is in it for me ?

You have an idea, project, business ?

• You pitch your idea / project / business during a PIE event as well as your burning challenges

• Participants ask you questions, give you advices, challenge you with care in order to help you to move forward

• You have the opportunity to connect to other idea / project / business holders to set up a local ecosystem of local positive impact entrepreneurial activities

• You want to pitch your idea, project, business ? Use this form to record it ; we'll contact you to plan your intervention and brief you about the event 

You are a participant ?

• You discover positive impact ideas / projects / businesses that are presented by their authors (you'll be anticipatively informed about the menu)

• You contribute to move these ideas forward by asking questions, sharing your experience and knowledge, by putting yourself in the shoes of the customer, user

• You identify opportunities and constraints of positive impact business models under development

• You take part to workshops based on collective intelligence aiming at translating positive impact business models into ideas / projects / businesses

• Your enrich your own ideas / projects / businesses with - why not ? - the objective to pitch at a next PIE event.
name: Brussels Positive Impact Entrepreneurs

description: Let’s get together to practice Taiji (Tai Chi) in Leuven! Taiji is an Internal Martial Art, which is popular for its beneficial effects on health. Practice of Taiji can be compared to meditation in motion, which optimizes the way you breathe, move and keep your balance. It is a great practice if you wish to relax your body and to concentrate your mind. Mastering martial applications of Taijiquan teaches you to defend yourself skillfully and almost effortlessly. Our teacher and guide is Erik Elsemans, president of YMAA in Belgium (Yang’s Martial Arts Association). He has been studying and practicing Taijiquan since 1996 with Dr. Yang, the founder of YMAA. Erik also practices and teaches Kung Fu, he is a certified YMAA Coach instructor. Starting from September 11th, we have weekly classes on Thursdays, at 18:30 for beginners and at 20:00 for those who has some experience. We have 18 sessions in four months, each session costs €12 and it lasts 1.5 h. If you have any questions, just send me an email! More about Erik Elsemans: http://ymaa.com/training/schools/ymaa-belgium More about Dr Yang: http://ymaa.com/publishing/authors/dr.yang_jwing-ming

Your CV is important, it's the base for a job. It reflects your strengths and your personality. This Group will encourage and support you in creating a powerful CV,  leading a successful job interview, writing a cover letter with impact, negotiating a salary increase. It will also give insights into how your profile LinkedIN is relevant to recruiters. I believe every person has personal strengths, but not everyone see and use them efffectively. I want to help, encourage you and find your personal best.

The group will have meet-ups which are workshops.

PS: CV as mentioned in the title 'CV Empowerment' has a larger meaning than a CV on paper. It's your Curriculum Vitae including your strengths, your interests, your gifts, your values, which are important for your life.

topics.name: Career, executive, placement, job search, resume
Career Advice, Career Help, Interview Skills

description: "Arigato Zen" (arigato: thank you in Japanese) is an easy & simple voice-meditation which Dr. Soho MACHIDA developed based on his 20-yrs. Zen training and scholarship as a specialist of comparative religion. By performing the "Arigato Zen", one is able to remove themselves of negative memories within one’s own sub-consciousness, which lie at the root of all problematic phenomena. By achieving clarity of the sub-consciousness, one is able to live with a sense of vast fulfillment and joyfulness. With his motto, "through physical practices, you can experience real mental change", Dr. Soho invented this revolutionary method of meditation that transcends religion and ethnicity. It consists of four pillars: 1."Arigato Breathing" 2."Kannon (bodhisattva) Zen" 3."Kansha (gratitude) Nembutsu" 4."Nehan (nirvana) Zen"
name: Brussels Arigato Zen Meditation by Dr Soho Machida

description: 'Sahaja' means 'in-born, natural, spontaneous' and 'yoga' is 'union with the Self or the Spirit'. Sahaja yoga is a unique method which allows you to get into meditation in a spontaneous way and thus reach a state of balance, well-being and self-knowledge. Meditation is a state of your mind, in which you are fully alert, but free from any thought. Your attention is solid and silent in the present moment. The basis is an extraordinary experience, called 'Self-realization', or the awakening of your spiritual life energy, which grants you the union of your deepest Self with the whole. Entering into the state of meditation or 'thoughtless awareness', for even a few moments every day, transforms all areas of your life : physical, mental, emotional and spiritual; you come in harmony with the world around you and feel less affected by the ups and downs of your everyday life. The quality of your life improves, ever more beautiful characteristics express themselves through your personality. The technique of Sahaja yoga meditation has been developed in 1970 by Shri Mataji Nirmala Devi. Her unique method has made immemorial knowledge about meditation and Self-realization accessible to all those who sincerely long for it. Shri Mataji received international recognition for her vision of world peace through inner transformation. What you can learn during the sessions : * meditation, step by step * use simple techniques to balance yourself * discover and improve the working of your energy centers (chakra's) * knowledge about the working of your subtle system : energy centers, energy channels, inner life force (Kundalini) * spiritual background of meditation
name: Sahaja Yoga Meetup - Leuven

C’est une approche novatrice pour les thérapeutes ou futurs thérapeutes qui désirent exercer leur art à partir du Soi et non plus à partir du moi/ego ; pour ceux d’entre eux qui souhaitent aborder la véritable souffrance inhérente à la psyché humaine et aller au-delà des formes innombrables sous lesquelles elle apparaît.
C’est aussi un chemin initiatique pour tous ceux qui ressentent que leur âme les appelle à aller au-delà de ce qui semble se passer pour leur ‘personnage’ dans le monde. Car en regardant l’autre à partir du Soi, ils sont eux aussi des thérapeutes.

description: Le Sit'in est un moment d'expérience. Avec l'aide d'un facilitateur ou en groupe, l'on donne à sa conscience l'espace et l'autorisation pour entrer en contact avec cette nouvelle réalité. Cinq 'clés' nous facilitent l'accès à cette réalité, pour qu'elle s'infiltre de plus en plus profondément en nous et dans notre vie quotidienne. Pour changer et croître, pour donner à sa vie un changement de cap durable, pour mettre sa vie quotidienne en harmonie avec sa source intérieure, il est avant tout important de donner du temps et de l'espace à son désir de changement. Un Sit'in est une pure expérience d'ÊTRE, qu'il est difficile de saisir par des mots. Cet état d'ÊTRE est primordial si l'on ne veut plus dépendre du monde qui nous entoure, inconscient de notre source intérieure de vie. Notre corps est notre terre sur laquelle nous vivons, avec à l'intérieur notre ciel ou notre source de vie qui nourrit notre sentiment de bonheur. Pendant la deuxième partie d'un Sit'in, nous recevons une 'clé' qui nous permet d'utiliser les obstacles dans notre vie comme levier de changement et de croissance. ______________________ Wat kun je van zo’n avond verwachten? Het leren in voeling komen met de supramentale werkelijkheid is voor velen een levensveranderende ervaring. Het reactiveert ons eigen celgeheugen en herinnert ons aan onze eigen volmaaktheid, gezond zijn en heel zijn. Het herstelt het evenwicht in onszelf en activeert ons zelfgenezend vermogen. De meditatie en heling werkt door op alle niveaus, zowel lichamelijk, geestelijk, emotioneel als spiritueel. Zo ontstaat, voor wie zich op dit meditatieve pad engageert, doorheen de tijd meer vertrouwen (kracht), herstel van fysieke balans, vergroting van je intuïtie, verruiming van je grenzen, loslaten van eigen angsten, helderheid in gevoelszaken, een diepe ervaring van rust en vrede. Het leren de leegte en de stilte ervaren brengt je automatisch bij de supramentale werkelijkheid. De ervaring wordt erg tastbaar wanneer je, om te starten, dit beoefent in de nabijheid van mensen die zich hier al een tijdje in geschoold hebben.
name: Brussels Sit'in Meetup

We want to get together and explore/create/talk about and practice the future of journalism in Brussels and beyond.

The members are English/French/Dutch/Spanish ... speaking (sessions mostly in English) and always looking to meet new boardgames enthusiasts.

We participate to both open events (organized by boardgame clubs & shops in the Brussels area) and private events (invite-based only). We meet usually during week-evenings or weekends. You can register on Boardgame Monkeys Meetup (our sister group) to get engaged with us.

We play all kinds of games, from Agricola, Yspahan, Small World to Settlers of Catan, Dominion, Munchkin, Carcassonne, 7 Wonders, Race for the galaxy, Ticket to ride and many many more. We love all types of board- and cardgames, and although we have mostly moved beyond the simplest games like Monopoly and Scrabble, we're always exited to try out what we call "modern boardgames"..

Vervolgens genieten we van thee en wat lekkers tijdens de deelronde waarin je je gesteund kan voelen in je moederschap. Het bewust worden van de kracht van je eigen intuïtie was voor mezelf een mijlpaal hierin.
Graag biedt ik je als ouder de ruimte om, in contact met je baby, te vertrouwen op datgene wat je voelt vanuit je hart.

description:
Regular swimming can offer anyone a wide range of health benefits. The ability to work your body without harsh impact to your skeletal system, a great way to increase muscular strength. Unlike exercise machines in a gym that tend to isolate one body part at a time, swimming puts the body through a broad range of motion that helps joints stay loose and flexible. It also helps to improve the most important muscle in our bodies, the heart. It´s great for keeping the weight under control, it lower stress and higher spirit!

So come and join to this group that is for anyone who wants swim training buddies. Our main goal would be to get together to practice on a regular basis.

All the pools I have been in Brussels are filled to capacity. To avoid conflict, and make everyone's experience more enjoyable please read online about Lap Swim Etiquette in case you are not used to swim in busy public pools. This is a new meet up group so I would highly appreciate if you could spread the word!
name: Brussels Swimmers
